description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jump from platform to platform to get the key and then make it to the exit without falling in the lava. With a button press the platforms randomly switch positions.
description.short: Jump from platform to platform to get the key and then make it to the exit without falling in the lava. With a button press the platforms randomly switch positions.
